description.oldValue:
Boost your productivity with two tabs side-by-side in one browser window. Multitask without losing focus. Users can access Split Screen by clicking the toolbar icon or selecting “Open link in split window” in the context menu.
GA date: April CY2023
description.newValue:
Boost your productivity with two tabs
side-by-side in one browser window. Multitask without losing focus. Users can
access Split Screen by clicking the toolbar icon or selecting “Open
link in split window” in the context menu.
